dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Welcome back, {activator.name}.
Thanks to your information about the concoction, my research is going well.

part.name: A Better Crystal
part.info: Gandyld, an old mage living east of Aris, has given you his spare mana crystal. However, since the crystal is rather weak, he has suggested that you go check out his information about King Rhun's alchemists coming up with a concoction that could enhance mana crystals. King Rhun's domain is in the heart of Giant Mountains, and his outpost is at the very peak of the mountains. The concoction would likely be in a cauldron or a pool in their laboratory.

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: {npc.name} mumbles something and slowly turns his attention to you.
What is it? Can't you see I'm busy here?

response.message: What are you so busy with?
Sorry, I'll be on my way.

dialog.name: busy
dialog.message: Hmph. I'm in the process of creating a very powerful mana crystal. Now, please excuse me. Like I said, I'm busy.

response.message: Sorry, I'll be on my way.

dialog.name: tellmore
dialog.message: You just don't want to give up, do you? Okay, I will tell you about mana crystals...
Mana crystals are items sought after by mages. They allow you to store a certain amount of mana, you see.

dialog.name: howwork
dialog.message: When a mage applies a mana crystal while he is full on mana, half of his mana will be transferred to the crystal. The mage can then apply the crystal at any time to get the mana back. Crystals have a maximum mana capacity, so mages are always after the ones that can hold the most.

dialog.name: whereget
dialog.message: They're quite rare, but some merchants trade them occasionally, or so I hear.
Hm, I seem to have a crystal I don't need right here. Do you want it?

dialog.name: yespls
dialog.message: Very well then... Here you go, and take care of it. It's not powerful, but it could still be useful to you.

Now, listen. I have heard that King Rhun's alchemists are trying to come up with a concoction that would enhance the mana limit of weak crystals, like the one I have just given you. It is strange to see giants coming up with magical enchantments, so it may not even work, or maybe explode on contact with the crystal. However, feel free to go and check it out, but if you do and it works, please come back so I can examine the crystal.

The heart of the Giant Mountains, just north of here, is King Rhun's domain. He has an outpost of sorts at the very peak of the mountains, where it is so cold most don't even dare approach. The concoction is likely to be in a cauldron or a pool in their laboratory. Be careful.

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: So, how did it go? Have you found the concoction and managed to enhance the crystal I have given you?

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: So, how did it go? Have you found the concoction and managed to enhance the crystal I have given you?

response.message: Yes, it worked. See for yourself...

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Hmm, I see! That is very interesting... and rather odd. You can still smell the brimstone too...

Very well... Seeing that their enchantment works, it is rather worrying. Maybe the giants are becoming intelligent? Hm... King Rhun is rather intelligent for a giant, and likes to experiment with alchemy and some magic, but most other giants? Very strange indeed.

At any rate, this seems like the sort of thing King Rhun would be interested in experimenting with, making it better. If you can find his concoction, you might be able to improve the crystal I have given you even further. I suggest trying to look for his vault or similar.

part.name: A Stronger Crystal
part.info: Gandyld suspects that since King Rhun likes to experiment with alchemy, he might have found a way to make the concoction even better. If so, it would probably be in his vault or similar.

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: So, how did it go? Have you found the concoction and managed to further enhance the crystal I have given you?

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: So, how did it go? Have you found the concoction and managed to further enhance the crystal I have given you?

response.message: Yes, I found it and it worked. See for yourself...

dialog.name: worked
dialog.message: Well, well... very interesting, {activator.name}. Thank you for the information, it's likely going to be quite valuable in my own research.
Use that enhanced mana crystal well.
